name: Chef Kush
description: Created for the culinary cannabis consumer, Chef Kush is an indica strain with a flavor destined for food. Created by Wolf Genetics, Chef Kush develops tight buds with a great calyx-to-leaf ratio and a voluminous aroma that is packed with blueberries, funky skunk, and Kush notes. This strain hits fast and leads to a speechless, relaxing high that melts over the body, releasing physical and mental tension. Grow this quality cut with an extra carbon filter, and prepare for complex and delicious buds with a fast and forceful onset.
descriptionPlain: Created for the culinary cannabis consumer, Chef Kush is an indica strain with a flavor destined for food. Created by Wolf Genetics, Chef Kush develops tight buds with a great calyx-to-leaf ratio and a voluminous aroma that is packed with blueberries, funky skunk, and Kush notes. This strain hits fast and leads to a speechless, relaxing high that melts over the body, releasing physical and mental tension. Grow this quality cut with an extra carbon filter, and prepare for complex and delicious buds with a fast and forceful onset.

highlightedReviews.text:
Probably some of the tastiest and most powerful kush lines I have ever sampled. Truly unique. 
Quite an unusual set of flavors and smells.
Skunk, Wood, Cheese funk and rotten blueberries.
Was very nice smoke, Very strong yet smooth.
Best damn shit of my life
